extension.http://rs.tdwg.org/ac/terms/Multimedia: Images, audio recordings or videos, including media metadata and license information - http://rs.tdwg.org/ac/terms/Multimedia
extension.http://data.ggbn.org/schemas/ggbn/terms/: Information on DNA amplification of a material - http://data.ggbn.org/schemas/ggbn/terms/Amplification
extension.http://purl.org/germplasm/germplasmTerm#: Describes genebank accessions for plant genetic resources - http://purl.org/germplasm/germplasmTerm#GermplasmAccession
Trait measurements for plant genetic resources - http://purl.org/germplasm/germplasmTerm#MeasurementScore
Trait descriptors describing methods and protocols followed when making trait measurements for plant genetic resources - http://purl.org/germplasm/germplasmTerm#MeasurementTrait
Measurement trial (field or greenhouse) to collect trait measurements for plant genetic resources - http://purl.org/germplasm/germplasmTerm#MeasurementTrial
extension.http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/Identificat: Information on multiple identifications of the same organism - http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/Identification
extension.http://rs.gbif.org/terms/1.0/Identifier: Alternative identifiers for a taxon - http://rs.gbif.org/terms/1.0/Identifier
extension.http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/Measurement: Measurements or facts associated with a record - http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/MeasurementOrFact
extension.http://rs.gbif.org/terms/1.0/Multimedia: Images, audio recordings or videos, including media metadata and license information - http://rs.gbif.org/terms/1.0/Multimedia
extension.http://rs.gbif.org/terms/1.0/Reference: Literature references for taxon or occurrence records - http://rs.gbif.org/terms/1.0/Reference
extension.http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/ResourceRel: Information on the relationship between records within a dataset or resources external to the dataset - http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/ResourceRelationship
extension.http://data.ggbn.org/schemas/ggbn/terms/: Information on DNA cloning of a material - http://data.ggbn.org/schemas/ggbn/terms/Cloning
Information on the gel image of a material - http://data.ggbn.org/schemas/ggbn/terms/GelImage
Information about how a specimen can be loaned and under which conditions - http://data.ggbn.org/schemas/ggbn/terms/Loan
Information on properties of material samples (e.g. tissues, DNA, RNA) - http://data.ggbn.org/schemas/ggbn/terms/MaterialSample
Information on permits associated with a material - http://data.ggbn.org/schemas/ggbn/terms/Permit
Information on how material was prepared - http://data.ggbn.org/schemas/ggbn/terms/Preparation
Information on how material was preserved - http://data.ggbn.org/schemas/ggbn/terms/Preservation
extension.http://rs.iobis.org/obis/terms/ExtendedM: Extended measurements or facts related to a biological occurrence, environmental measurements or facts and sampling method attributes - http://rs.iobis.org/obis/terms/ExtendedMeasurementOrFact
extension.http://rs.tdwg.org/chrono/terms/Chronome: Chronometric age information in cases where the collecting event is not contemporaneous with the time when the organism was alive - http://rs.tdwg.org/chrono/terms/ChronometricAge
extension.http://rs.gbif.org/terms/1.0/DNADerivedD: Includes relevant information for records derived based on DNA analysis - http://rs.gbif.org/terms/1.0/DNADerivedData
